channel.title: Books and Philosophy
channel.description:
Hello,
I am a bookworm and proud of it. It's my strong opinion that books form a person's psychology and a connection to the realm outside our imagination. I'd like to know what genre of books do you appreciate?
Please avoid the technical books as much as possible since the whole point of this discussion is to know your other side and the spectrum of philosophies.

item.title: Books and Philosophy
item.dc:creator: Derfloink
item.description:
I’m often reading technical books that give me knowledge.

Otherwise I read mangas, but I don’t count them as books, 'cause they’re more like comics and without much text.

If I’m reading a “normal” book I can’t really get any habits I can share. Last “normal” book was:
The Wave (Morton Rhue)

Read full topic
